news_header: High bankruptcy applications in Finland, especially among small firms, with 128 in one week, the highest since 2020.
news_original_title: Vuoden alussa tehty poikkeuksellisen paljon konkurssihakemuksia
news_text: In Finland, an exceptional number of bankruptcy applications have been filed, with 128 enterprises declared bankrupt in the third week of the year, the highest weekly figure since 2020. In 2024, a total of 3006 enterprises went bankrupt, the largest number in the 2000s, predominantly affecting small firms.
